Package org.drasyl.remote.handler.crypto

Class ArmHandlerUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drasyl.remote.handler.crypto.ArmHandlerUtil
  • public final class ArmHandlerUtil
extends Object
    A simple util/helper class for the ArmHandler that provides some static methods.

                                                                         throws InvalidMessageFormatException
        Decrypts the given msg with the given agreementPair.
        Parameters:
        agreementPair - the encryption key pair
        msg - the message to decrypt
        Returns:
        the decrypted message or an exception on error
        Throws:
        InvalidMessageFormatException - if the message could not be decrypted
